attributes.action: Reward All Science Technicians in Schools With Full Time Employment AND A Salary To Match The Hard Work And Experience Used
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Science Technicians are a grossly overlooked and a valuable asset to secondary schools. But we are underpaid and often are only offered term time only work, not full time.We have skills that are used to the full but a pay scale that borders on slavery. We aim to bring the plight of Science Technicians into the Governments eye and get something to happen.
